title: multi exec change rdb
body:
hi,

using any multi exec, even an empty one will produce one change in the rdb and so will generate a background save process

does redis internally store in his dataset that a "multi" is initiated ?

comments_data.body: Hello, this is a bug indeed... Thanks for reporting. Fixing ASAP, probably tomorrow.
Fixed into unstable and 2.8 branches, I'll backport this into 2.6 later today or tomorrow after more testing.
it work fine in 2.6, thank again :)
Very cool to get an ACK on that, thanks.
